body_html:
I left this line in the elemental_ir_emitter:

llvm_ir::IrArray::Index dim_index(1, ir_builder_->getInt64(i));

I believe it is an index into the vector of indices, and that the CreateZExtOrBitCast function will successfully extend the int32 to whatever the native size of the target IR is.
body:
I left this line in the elemental_ir_emitter:

```
llvm_ir::IrArray::Index dim_index(1, ir_builder_->getInt64(i));
```
I believe it is an index into the vector of indices, and that the CreateZExtOrBitCast function will successfully extend the int32 to whatever the native size of the target IR is.
